page.title: 12Thorpe Salvin Hall
page.content: The Salvin family owned{Thorpe Hall first and they were the ones who built it.It was passed to the Sandfords.A man called Brian Sandford pulled down Thorpe Hall and made it a{Tudor house in Queen Elizabeths the first reign.Brian Sandford gave Thorpe Hall to William Huett.William Huett had a daughter called Anne.Anne married Edward Osborne.Then the Hall was passed to the Osborne family.The sons of the Osborne family left the Hall in 1697 and it has been empty since then.The{ruins}can still be seen,but they are{private}and you cannot go round them.
